scripts.test: tsc && cp -r ./src/dashboard ./dist && cp -r ./src/assets ./dist && cd dist && find . -path ./dashboard -prune -o -type f -exec sed -i 's/[	]\{1,\}//g; s/    //g' {} + > /dev/null 2>&1 && node --enable-source-maps index && cd ..
scripts.build: rm -r dist && tsc --pretty false --removeComments true && cp -r ./src/dashboard ./dist && cp -r ./src/assets ./dist && cd dist && find . -path ./dashboard -prune -o -type f -exec sed -i 's/[	]\{1,\}//g; s/    //g' {} + > /dev/null 2>&1 && cd ..
scripts.build:full: rm -r dist && cd ./src/dashboard && pnpm build && cd ../.. && tsc --pretty false --removeComments true && cp -r ./src/dashboard ./dist && cp -r ./src/assets ./dist && cd dist && find . -path ./dashboard -prune -o -type f -exec sed -i 's/[	]\{1,\}//g; s/    //g' {} + > /dev/null 2>&1 && cd ..
